com.tim.yamba

Class YambaApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.tim.yamba.YambaApplication

  • public class YambaApplication
extends Application
    This is an android.app.Application object. It provides shared attributes and methods (like prefs, getTwitter()).
    Author:
    Tim
    See Also:
    android.app.Application
